name: web-asset-generator-marketplace
description: Official marketplace for Web Asset Generator - A Claude Code plugin for generating favicons, app icons, and social media images

plugins.name: web-asset-generator
plugins.description: Generate favicons, app icons, and social media images from logos, text, or emojis. Features emoji suggestions, WCAG validation, and automatic framework integration for Next.js, Astro, SvelteKit, and more.
